name: Onsite Control Systems
tag_list: software, software-application, software-product, it, it-consultants, construction-information-system, construction-services, construction-collaboration, construction-management-systems, construction-document-management, mobile-construction-software, appl
overview:
OnSiteIMS provides flexible collaboration in construction pre-build, build and post-build phases and across all disciplines. The OnSiteIMS platform utilises both online and mobile technologies engaging Clients, Developers, Project Managers, Architects, Consultants and Contractors, allowing the creation, channeling and management of all contract-related information, documentation and actions through one digital platform.

OnSiteIMS is designed to reduced complexity, increase accountability and streamline key processes in real-time resolving a number of industry challenges in Information, Cost and Quality control, Query and Drawing tracking as well as Contractual Completion and Time management to name a few.
